tool_description: A Crypto News API pulling data from around the world about the latest news in crypto
name: Crypto News Live_v2
title: Crypto News Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Sources
api_list.description: Get Crypto News from a Specific Source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-live9.p.rapidapi.com/news/CryptoNews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-live9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-live9.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-live9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Crypto News
api_list.description: Gets all crypto news from the currently configured websites
